Class SortingThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • SortingThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class SortingThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class synchronizes threads and sorts it's values.
    Author:
    Dusan Makevic
